title: patita pAvanam bhAgavatam idu
sahitya:
patita pAvanam bhAgavatam idu paramAnandamE pari 
pakkuvamAna yOgigaLadu paranda karuNai piranda vazhiyidu


anupallavi

  poduvil adu idu enrE kuzhambum manam pOi alaiyAdE enrE niruttum kaNam 
puNNiya nilai enbadu tAnuramighum pOghaviDum pulanAvadu pArum
pUttuk-kulangum nandavanattiDai pOyirumAmadak-kaLir enavAgum
eNNiyapaDi adai aDakki nirutti emperumAn shuzhark-kIDiNaiyAgum
inda vidam naDandErum enum oru iccai irundAl niccayam pADum


caraNam    oru padattil AghAda Ananda nilai enna OrAyiram padattil kUrumO 
uLam kanindu sukha munivan uraittavac-collinirkku upamAnam sholla enrAl AghumO]
karu mAmukhil aNaivadum mazhai taruvadum kAna mAmayil uLamadu pOl
kaNDu koNDu uravAgiDa ninra karuttu nirainda vaNNamadu pOl
uruvAgina tiru mantram oruvanin uLam kalanduravAnadu pOl
uNDAgina karpanai mIduru ena ttparamAnadu arputamAnadu
